text: == Events == * Saladin unsuccessfully besieges the Hospitaller fortress of Krak des Chevaliers in modern Syria. * Newgate Prison is built. * Richard Lionheart allies with Philip II of France against his father, Henry II of England. * Giraldus Cambrensis and Baldwin of Exeter travel through Wales attempting to recruit men for the Third Crusade. * The "Saladin tithe" is levied in England. * Alfonso IX of Castile becomes king of Leon. * Queen Tamar of Georgia marries David Soslan.
